review_text: The checkout process is too confusing and I had to re-enter my card details twice.
Really love the new dashboard! It's fast and much easier to navigate than before.
Customer support took too long to respond. I waited almost 3 days for a reply.
I'm happy with the product overall, but the mobile app crashes randomly when I try to upload photos.
Pricing is a bit high compared to competitors. Not sure if I'll renew next year.
Great experience! The team helped me set everything up within an hour.
I keep getting locked out of my account even though I reset my password. Very frustrating.
The onboarding guide was very helpful. It made the setup quick and smooth.
The dashboard loads slowly in the mornings. Might be a performance issue on your end.
Would appreciate more integrations with tools like Slack or HubSpot.
The analytics module is powerful but takes a while to understand. More tutorials would help.
Live chat support resolved my issue in minutes—very impressed!
Mobile notifications are inconsistent. Sometimes I don’t get alerts at all.
Payment failed twice this week. Please fix the billing system.
The UI looks outdated compared to other tools I use.
Fantastic value for the price. Exceeded my expectations!
Search results are inaccurate when filtering by category.
The latest update fixed all the issues I was having. Thank you!
I wish there were more customization options in the dashboard.
The product is good, but onboarding emails were confusing and repetitive.
